content.description: Start as for Ballistic and do a huge move out right to an edge.  Then top it out.  A simple, short, and hard problem.
content.location: From the parking lot on the right before the ranger station at the north shore walk down hill on the gravel trail towards the lake and when you see an obvious cube boulder just off the trail to the right bust up into the woods to the right and trend south about a hundred feet. Very close to the trail.  The problem faces downhill.

content.description: Start on the jug in the middle of the face and do a ballistic dyno to the lip and mantel.  A huge move.
content.location: Walk down from the Smooth Operator parking (coming from north shore entrance the parking is on the way down to the ranger station).  Walk down the gravel trail towards the lake and about halfway down there is a cube boulder on the right near the trail.  Head up into the woods above the cube boulder and go uphill and trend slightly left.  About 150 feet off the trail.

content.description: A flat-topped boulder with a vertical face, tucked under a few trees near the bottom of this area.
